Text:
Let me share the Easiest trick to activate these keys.
~Advantages of this modified - trick~
You DONT have to type that 1111-1111-** registration code.
You DONT have to go offline while activating the keys.

Just drag and drop them on the Kaspersky key-changer.

http://farm5.static.flickr.com/4143/4896710637_f62dcfd93b_b.jpg
